definition: to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms
(archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude

sentences.english: Xiao Hong's former residence was situated at the South Second Street located on the secluded corner of this county town.
sentences.chinese: 萧红故居，坐落于县城较偏僻的南二道街。

sentences.english: The earl rarely visited his country seat in shropshire.
sentences.chinese: 伯爵很少去他在什罗普郡的乡村故居。

sentences.english: Soil, but the former residence. Prometheans million.
Liang's former residence at No. 33 Fish Road.
sentences.chinese: 梁实秋故居位于鱼山路33号。

sentences.english: Three-su Temple is the former residence of SU Dongpo, an eminent writer of the Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 三苏祠是我国北宋大文豪苏东坡的故居。

sentences.english: The withered weeds on the tiled eaves of your shut-up house.
sentences.chinese: 你的关闭了的故居檐头的枯死的瓦菲。

sentences.english: Foreign teachers visit the Historian, Mr. Gu Yanwu's home.
sentences.chinese: 我院外教访问顾史学家炎武先生故居。

sentences.english: Before us is the former residence of Li Hongzhang, you come with me.
sentences.chinese: 在我们面前的就是李鸿章故居了，大家随我进来。

sentences.english: Beside the front door was a plaque with Marx’s leonine head in profile.
sentences.chinese: 在故居的前门旁边有一座马克思的头像。

sentences.english: She said they had been "more than surprised" by the global interest.
sentences.chinese: 她说，故居引发全球竞购令他们“喜出望外”。

sentences.english: My mum was very impressed with 'Sai Jin Hua's former residence'.
sentences.chinese: 我今天去的最有价值的地方是赛金花故居。

sentences.english: Her house is a museum now.
sentences.chinese: 她的故居现在已是博物馆了。

sentences.english: This scene was in the same area as the Tagore House, where poet Rabindranath Tagore was born. Photograph by Dilip Mehta
sentences.chinese: 这幕场景就发生于诗人泰戈尔故居所处的同一地区。

sentences.english: Former residence of the alley with Qingdao Municipal Cultural Relics Bureau established nameplate.
sentences.chinese: 故居巷口有青岛市文物局立的铭牌。

sentences.english: Former Residence of Lao She in Huangxian Road 12, two-story building, Block south.
sentences.chinese: 老舍故居位于黄县路12号，为二层楼房，座北朝南。
